name: OracleVendingMachine

attributes.documentation: @title Proxy - Generic proxy contract allows to execute all transactions applying the code of a master contract. @author Stefan George - <[email protected]>

attributes.documentation:
@dev Constructor function sets address of master copy contract.
 @param _masterCopy Master copy address.
@dev Fallback function forwards all transactions and returns all received return data.

Implements ERC 20 Token standard: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-20-token-standard.md
 @title Abstract token contract - Functions to be implemented by token contracts
attributes.name: Token

attributes.documentation:

@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
